Transcription for 19101

Well in the wintertime you wouldn't see daylight.
You go to work when it's dark and you're coming home when it's dark in the wintertime.
And we have kids who still watch them getting out the carriages from up at the pits up the valley
with their lamps in their heads, headlamps, you see, oil lamps.
And it's a pretty sight to see them all jumping out the carriages and running down over the tips
coming home, you see.
